answers.answer: It may have been the heat from the shower and yes that would be normal to feel a bit faint and see spots. However, if it's still occurring once you've cooled down from the shower then that would not be normal and you should call your ob office.
Yes it's happened to me I think my water was to hot and I've learned to limit my shower to 15 min! But yes like said above my comment if it happening once ur cooled call ur doc
Keep an eye on that. If it happens again I would check your blood pressure. It's a sign or high blood pressure. It happened to me often when I was pregnant with my son and had preeclampsia.
Ok I will let the doctor know at my next appointment thanks

question: Hi I was taking a shawer and started to gage then started seing spots all over is this normal should I be concerned or should I go to the er please help im verry scared thanks
title: seing spots
